title: Keys of Death
description: It was 0255:10 when Green Beret 1st Lieutenant John Tolson and his nine man team, accompanied by two CIA operatives were aboard the Mohawk OV-1A, waiting for the big bird to drop them off to a place they may never return from, and quite possibly never reach. The night was dark and silent, and the stars obscured by low-hanging clouds. The helicopter was in whisper mode, so the rotor blades overhead could hardly be heard, only a swishing sound of the blades as they cut through the air. Using the infrared flashlight, John began to write.
author: James Tomas
